channel.title: Display Features on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Display Features on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Show and Hide Worksheets and Tabs
item.description: Aspose.Cells allows the user to show and hide elements of a workbook including worksheets and tabs. Contents Summary 1 Show and Hide a Worksheet 1.1 Making a Worksheet Visible 1.2 Hiding a Worksheet 2 Show and Hide Tabs 2.1 Making Tabs Visible 2.2 Hiding Tabs 2.3 Controlling the Tab Bar Width | Show and Hide a Worksheet An Excel file can have one or more than one worksheets.

item.title: Show and Hide Rows Columns and Scroll Bars
item.description: Aspose.Cells provides ways to control the visibility of Rows, Column and Scroll Bars of a worksheet. Contents Summary 1 Show and Hide Rows and Columns 1.1 Show Rows and Columns 1.2 Hide Rows and Columns 1.3 Hide Multiple Rows and Columns 2 Show and Hide Scroll Bars 2.1 Controlling the Visibility of Scroll Bars 2.1.1 Making Scroll Bars Visible 2.1.2 Hiding Scroll Bars || Show and Hide Rows and Columns Aspose.

item.title: Show and Hide Gridlines and Row Column Headers
item.description: Aspose.Cells supports hiding and showing Gridlines of the worksheet which are visible by default. It also provides controlling visibility of Row Column Headers of the worksheet. Contents Summary 1 Show and Hide Gridlines 1.1 Controlling the Visibility of the Gridlines 1.1.1 Making Gridlines Visible 1.1.2 Hiding Gridlines 2 Show and Hide Row Column Headers 2.1 Controlling the Visibility of the Worksheets 2.1.1 Making Row/Column Headers Visible 2.1.2 Hiding Row/Column Headers
